00077   index_type _hash(std::string key) const {
00078     int hash = 0;
00079     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < key.size(); ++i) {
00080       hash += key[i] * (i + 1);
00081     }
00082     return hash % size_m;
00083   }
00084 
00089   void _deep_copy(const Self& x) {
00090     for (int i = 0; i < x.size_m; ++i) {
00091       bucket_list_m[i] = x.bucket_list_m[i];
00092     }
00093   }

00196     base_iterator& operator++ () {
00197       if (map_m != NULL && ++value_it_m != map_m->bucket_list_m[bucket_index_m]->end()) {
00198       } else {
00199         while (map_m->bucket_list_m[++bucket_index_m] == NULL);
00200         if (bucket_index_m <= map_m->size_m) {
00201           value_it_m = map_m->bucket_list_m[bucket_index_m]->begin();

00203           map_m = NULL;
00204           bucket_index_m = -1;
00205           value_it_m = _value_iterator();

00207       }
00208       return *this;
00209     }

00311   size_type size() const {
00312     int size = 0;
00313     for (_bucket_const_iterator bit = bucket_list_m.begin(); bit != bucket_list_m.end(); ++bit) {
00314       if (*bit != NULL) {
00315         for (_value_const_iterator vit = (*bit)->begin(); vit != (*bit)->end(); ++vit) {
00316           ++size;
00317         }
00318       }
00319     }
00320     return size;
00321   }

00327   std::pair<iterator, bool> insert(const value_type& x) {
00328     int hash_value = _hash(x.first);
00329     _value_list* bucket = bucket_list_m[hash_value];
00330     // collision occur
00331     if (bucket != NULL) {
00332       // find branches
00333       _value_iterator chain_it = std::find(bucket->begin(), bucket->end(), x);
00334       if (chain_it == bucket->end()) {
00335         bucket->push_back(x);
00336         return std::make_pair(iterator(this, hash_value, --bucket->end()), true);
00337       } else {
00338         return std::make_pair(iterator(this, hash_value, chain_it), false);
00339       }
00340     }
00341     // no collision
00342     _value_list* new_chain = new _value_list();
00343     new_chain->push_back(x);
00344     bucket_list_m[hash_value] = new_chain;
00345     return std::make_pair(iterator(this, hash_value, --new_chain->end()), true);
00346   }
00347 
00352   void erase(iterator pos) {
00353     if (pos != end()) {
00354       bucket_list_m.erase(pos.value_it_m);
00355     }
00356   }

00362   size_type erase(const Key& x) {
00363     _value_list* bucket = bucket_list_m[_hash(x)];
00364     if (bucket != NULL) {
00365       for (_value_iterator vit = bucket->begin(); vit != bucket->end(); ++vit) {
00366         if (vit->first == x) {
00367           bucket->erase(vit);
00368           return 1;
00369         }
00370       }
00371     }
00372     return 0;
00373   }

00380     for (_bucket_iterator bit = bucket_list_m.begin(); bit != bucket_list_m.end(); ++bit) {
00381       if (*bit != NULL) {
00382         (*bit)->clear();
00383       }
00384     }
00385     bucket_list_m.clear();
00386   }

00392   iterator find(const Key& x) {
00393     int hash_value = _hash(x);
00394     _value_list* bucket = bucket_list_m[hash_value];
00395     if (bucket != NULL) {
00396       for (_value_iterator vit = bucket->begin(); vit != bucket->end(); ++vit) {
00397         if (vit->first == x) {
00398           return iterator(this, hash_value, vit);
00399         }
00400       }
00401     }
00402     return end();
00403   }

00409   const_iterator find(const Key& x) const {

00412     if (bucket != NULL) {
00413       for (_value_const_iterator vit = bucket->begin(); vit != bucket->end(); ++vit) {
00414         if (vit->first == x) {
00415           return const_iterator(this, hash_value, vit);

00418     }
